pages.text: Mobs drops extra experience when slain by the spell caster. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter yearns to learn form the world around it. Imbues onto the Scepter of Insight and persists through the Path of Resonance
